name: Prince of Persia: A Labyrinth of Doors
overview: This time the sultan's dungeons, like your dreams, are full of a multiplicity of doors. A ported to C64 faithfully based on a 2007 mod for the DOS version by MMitch, and ported in late 2011 to C64 by Starwindz. These 13 levels are essentially focused on opening doors, sometimes a lot of them, and tricks trying to find hidden or obscured levers. Oh, did I forget to mention the 60 minute time limit, better open some doors!
